Name: Happy Halloween
About the game: Happy Halloween - is a usual 2D platformer where you have to do various picturesque hardcore levels playing as a main character Jack. The plot of the game consists in having fun Halloween. The main aim is doing different levels and collecting definite items – pumpkins. The exact number of pumpkins is here. Collect them and the witch house will be opened. It will be a crossing to the next level. Don’t be sure it is a child’s game because there will be different obstacles and opponents. Be careful! You have only one try to do the level. Move ahead to your target, get over the traps. You will be pleased with the game!
